abstract: Jamie Lovemark and Jhonattan Vegas share lead after second-round play is suspended at Zurich Classic in Avondale, La; other golf news noted.
snippet: Jamie Lovemark and Jhonattan Vegas shared the lead at 11 under par in the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La., when second-round play was suspended because of darkness.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Lovemark and Jhonattan Vegas shared the lead at 11 under par in the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La., when second-round play was suspended because of darkness.
